intro: Escape a quarantined hospital haunted by a sinister entity. A short yet intense horror experience blending puzzles, action, and cinematic QTEs that will test your nerves.
description:
BLACK BLOOD is a third-person indie horror game that puts you in the shoes of the last survivor trapped inside a quarantined hospital. When an unknown disease turns blood black and a dreadful presence takes control, your only chance is to solve puzzles, survive the infected, and face the horrors within.




Main Features:
• Immersive story and oppressive atmosphere: explore sealed rooms, waiting areas, operating theaters, and corridors hiding clues about the hospital’s dark past.
• Mix of puzzles and action: alternate exploration and environmental puzzle solving with tense combat encounters.
• Integrated QTEs and cinematic sequences: adrenaline-filled moments that blend gameplay with storytelling.
• Compact, intense experience: designed to deliver a short yet memorable session, perfect for players seeking a concentrated dose of tension.




Story:
An unknown infection spreads throughout the hospital. Doors and windows are sealed, and a monstrous being lurks in the shadows. Gather clues, solve puzzles to unlock new areas, and confront the infected.




Are you ready to discover what hides within the halls? Survive BLACK BLOOD.
